scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income levels and purchase history.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of the deployed customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A deployed model predicts customer churn probability based on anonymized customer data.  The model is accessible through a public API.
